meta_description.message: Fast Scroll is a tiny extension that allows you to scroll through web pages faster by pressing a key of your choice

Settings_InvertBehavior_label.description: Label of the checkbox which allows to invert the extension's behavior

Settings_InvertBehavior_description.description: Description of the extension's behavior when this checkbox is checked
Settings_InvertBehavior_description.message: Always scroll faster by default, and scroll at normal speed when the selected key is pressed

Settings_KeyToPress_label.description: Label for the text field that allows to define the key to press

Settings_ScrollSpeedMultiplier_label.description: Label for the text field that allows to define the scroll speed multiplier
